content: this crochet snowflake is #5 of this year s mini cal the collection of ornaments has wintery names fitting perfectly into the season of cold white snow and festivities explore the list of all free patterns in this post 1 this pattern uses basic stitches and is worked in the round the finished snowflake measures circa 9 cm 3 54″ 1 https //crochetpedia com/crochet-snowflake-patterns-2023/
